channel.title: Codelingo-vs-linters on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Codelingo-vs-linters on Bodacious Blog

item.title: CodeLingo vs Linters
item.description: Making tenets with CLQL that do the job of existing linters I started learning Go and CodeLingo / CLQL at the same time, so while I have found it generally easy and straightforward to create these tenets, I feel like I could’ve knocked them out even faster if I didn’t need to look up answers to questions such as ‘what is an interface in golang?’, for example. The process has been intuitive; I think in part to having a good naming convention.
